content: yagienki mittens is a simple crochet pattern for making mittens perfect for autumn and winter the pdf file contains -graphic diagram chart us terms -written pattern -sewing instructions with photos -technicalities remember that size of your mittens will depend on the type and amount of yarn crochet hook size and the way you crochet the stitches if you have any questions regarding this pattern please feel free to contact me let me know if you have any problems with downloading the pattern you ll receive a digital file only instantly downloadable as a pdf and won t be shipped anything enjoy your crocheting
